speaker: Secret Anvil
lines: You step behind a shelf and find a small anvil in a quiet room.
You set the runed strip on the face and feel a faint vibration.
A hammer hangs on the wall, the handle polished smooth.
The shop is a murmur outside; in here it is still.
You can strike and swear an oath to the work.
Or you can pocket the strip and walk away.

choices.text: Strike and swear the Oath of Iron.
Turn away and keep the runed strip.

give_item.name: Runed Strip
give_item.description: Sharp in a way only some notice

choices.text: Test the hammer on your doubts first (fight).
